Uses of Package
ch.lambdaj.function.matcher

  • Packages that use ch.lambdaj.function.matcher 
    Package Description
    ch.lambdaj  
    ch.lambdaj.function.matcher  
  • Classes in ch.lambdaj.function.matcher used by ch.lambdaj 
    Class and Description
    HasArgumentWithValue
    A matcher that returns true if the value resulting from the evaluation af the given argument matches the given matcher.
  • Classes in ch.lambdaj.function.matcher used by ch.lambdaj.function.matcher 
    Class and Description
    AndMatcher
    A matcher that logically combines a set of matchers returning true if all of them satisfy its own condition.
    HasArgumentWithValue
    A matcher that returns true if the value resulting from the evaluation af the given argument matches the given matcher.
    LambdaJMatcher
    A Matcher that extends the Hamcrest BaseMatcher by adding two fluent interface style methods that allow to logically combine two matchers.
    OrMatcher
    A matcher that logically combines a set of matchers returning true if at least one of them satisfies its own condition.
